content: Gain on sale margin attributable to the channels before giving effect to the impact of capital markets and other activity was 61 basis points in the first quarter of 2022, versus 125 basis points in the first quarter of 2021, and 58 basis points in the fourth quarter of 2021. Due to the sale of MSR assets, the total number of servicing customers declined 18% in the first quarter of 2022, compared to the fourth quarter of 2021. Servicing portfolio UPB was $102 billion at the end of the first quarter of 2022, declining 3.6% year over year, and down 20.5% compared to the fourth quarter of 2021 due to the sale of MSR assets. Home Point Capital's board of directors has declared a cash dividend of $0.04 per share for the first quarter of 2022, payable to shareholders of record as of May 24, 2022.
